game.name: Trover Saves the Universe
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: From Squanch Games comes Trover Saves the Universe. Your pups are missing. The cosmos is at stake. Only you and Trover can save everything in this bizarre comedy adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: From Squanch Games comes Trover Saves the Universe. Your pups are missing. The cosmos is at stake. Only you and Trover can save everything in this bizarre comedy adventure!

reviewHighlights.text: 한글이 없음에도 불구하고 F***이랑 SH*T만 들으면 그저 재밌는 게임 특유의 유머센스가 호불호 갈릴 순 있지만 나에게는 갓겜
